price: Lakini aliye dhulumu, kisha akabadilisha wema baada ya ubaya, basi Mimi ni Mwenye kusamehe Mwenye kurehemu.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسۡنَۢا بَعۡدَ سُوٓءٖ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٞ
footnotes: Lakini mwenye kutenda asicho ruhusiwa, na kisha akaleta wema baada ya kuteleza kwake, basi Mimi ni Mwingi wa kusamehe, Mkubwa wa kurehemu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: illā man ẓalama thumma baddala ḥus'nan baʿda sūin fa-innī ghafūrun raḥīmun
